name: claude-ws (Claude-Workspace)
description: [项目级] Access Claude Code as Kanban in Web. Work from anywhere with consistent performance. Intuitive workflow, flexible plugins.。来源: https://github.com/Claude-Workspace/claude-ws

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Access Claude Code as Kanban in Web. Work from anywhere with consistent performance. Intuitive workflow, flexible plugins.

来源: https://github.com/Claude-Workspace/claude-ws
语言: TypeScript
Stars: 199

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:
CLAUDE.md.example
DISCLAIMER.md
LICENSE
README-docs-swagger.md
README.md
bin
bin/claude-ws.js
components.json
docs
docs/OUTPUT_FORMAT_API.md
docs/cloudflare-tunnel.md
docs/project-roadmap.md
docs/publish-checklist.md
docs/release-process.md
double_request.txt
drizzle.config.ts
drizzle
drizzle/0000_low_gressill.sql
drizzle/0001_calm_thunderbolt_ross.sql
drizzle/0002_smooth_magneto.sql

genes.title: 核心特性
genes.content:
- **Kanban Board** — Drag-and-drop task management with full conversation history
- **Real-time Streaming** — Live Claude responses via Socket.io
- **Checkpoints** — Save and rewind to any conversation state
- **Code Editor** — Tabbed CodeMirror with syntax highlighting and AI suggestions
- **Git Integration** — Status, stage, commit, diff, visual graph
- **Agent Factory** — Plugin system for custom skills, commands, agents
- **Themes** — Light, Dark, VS Code variants, Dracula

---
